ygData.subject: Re: Updated Song Analysis 21+ (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant once replied to this - saying The new songs will be added once something else is added ..  As far as a bind song - if the info from JMC (a former
ygData.messageBody:
Verant once replied to this - saying "The new songs will be added once
something else is added".. As far as a bind song - if the info from JMC (a
former member of this list who allegedly had close contacts within the
development group) It ain't ever gonna happen.

But lets not debate this point again endlessly <g>

Slyde of Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: <John_Senior@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 9:28 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Updated Song Analysis 21+ (long)


> From: John_Senior@...
>
> Do Verant plan to add new songs? Maybe a bind affinity song at level 39
> would be nice!! 8=)
>
> Teleport at level 45, Haste at 47 and 150 DD song at 49 would satisfy me
> 8=) hehe
>
> Madagan, Bard of 27 songs - Camped outside Solusek A
>
>
>
>
>
> "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...> on 09/11/99 14:52:43
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Updated Song Analysis 21+ (long)
>
>
>
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> These songs are currently not in the game according to GZ at Verant
>
> Rokenn
>
>
> >From: John_Senior@...
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Updated Song Analysis 21+ (long)

> >

> >
> >Madagan,
